name: Hoppy Penguin
description:
Hi, my names chase. This is my first game and I'm happy to say I kinda finished something. I'm busy with my freshman year of college and will probably put another 20 hours worth of work into this game. I hope you enjoy and please leave feedback positive or negative it's awesome to know people are playing something I created.

Anyways on to the game it's a jump platformer similar to popular games like jump king and pogo stuck. 

It fits the theme of the jam with the plot. 

Things I plan on working on in the game in the next week - level select menu, two more levels, scene transitions, sound

Possible things im considering- limting rewind per level, time based levels, co-op, a lot more levels, giving up on the game xD, more visuals, speed run timer
